boat.full_description: Was Yawl rigged, cabin enlarged and rerigged 1998, featured in books "Sailing Round Ireland" and "Sailing Round Russia", by Wallace Clarke.
boat.name: Wild Goose of Moyle

ownerships.note: Owners: Maurice Griffiths 1936, Robert Baa Jr1937, John Douglas Cochrane 1946 , William Gordon  Foster 1948, Samuel Mervyn Henry & Desmond Mathers Pollock 1953, Henry Wallace Stuart Clarke 1957, Henry Wallace Stuart Clarke & Miles John Stuart Clarke 1989, Henry Wallace Stuart Clarke 1993,
